title: Bound by Time
description: It’s her destiny to break the seal, and his to ensure she survives…  On break from college, Isobel is looking forward to making her own decisions while her parents are overseas. When she returns home, she discovers it’s no longer the welcoming place it used to be and the antique window her parents installed is more than just a beautiful piece of history.  Isobel has locked away the strange power that resides inside her, terrified of what might happen if she acknowledges it. She dreams of places she’s never been and times long before she was born. As her dreams grow more intense and things spiral of control, Isobel begins to question her sanity. Desperate for answers, she will have to overcome her fears in order to find them.  Damien is an ancient, even for a dark angel, and he knows the demon who hunts Isobel is a formidable foe; he’s watched the battle play out too many times before. Haunted by past failures, he’s determined keep Isobel alive as she unravels a past that spans centuries and prepares to face the demon that wants her dead.
author: A.D. Trosper
